product_name: Stanley Classic Vacuum Mug - 16 fl. oz.
long_description: The 16 fl. oz. Stanley Classic Vacuum mug keeps coffee piping hot for 6 hrs. on even the coldest mornings. Vacuum-insulated body and thermal lid keep drinks hot for 6 hrs. and cold for 24 hrs. 18/8 stainless steel body won't rust; naturally BPA free. Open and close the push-button, leakproof lid with just 1 hand. Lid is dishwasher safe; wash the mug by hand.
short_description: The 16 fl. oz. Stanley Classic Vacuum mug keeps coffee piping hot for 6 hrs. on even the coldest mornings.
